sqlMap.select:
from AuthLog WHERE 1=1
auth_time > #auth_time#
auth_time < #auth_time_end#
id = #id#
ip like '%' || #ip# || '%'
loginFailReason.id = #loginFailReason.id#
loginResult.id = #loginResult.id#
staff.id = #staff.id#
staff.name like '%' || #staff.name# || '%'
requestUrl = #requestUrl#
order by auth_time desc

select count(*) from AuthLog WHERE 1 = 1
auth_time > #auth_time#
auth_time < #auth_time_end#
id = #id#
ip like '%' || #ip# || '%'
loginFailReason.id = #loginFailReason.id#
loginResult.id = #loginResult.id#
staff.id = #staff.id#
staff.name like '%' || #staff.name# || '%'
requestUrl = #requestUrl#

select count(*) from AuthLog where
auth_time > #start# and auth_time < #end#
and staff.username = #username# and loginFailReason.type = 'LOGIN_FAIL_REASON' and loginFailReason.val = 'LOGIN_FAIL_REASON_ERROR_PASSWORD'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.*, ROWNUM RN_ FROM ( select a.id, to_char(a.auth_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') auth_time, a.ip, b.text as login_fail_reason, c.text as login_result, d.staff_code, e.name from U_AUTH_LOG a left join s_dictionary b on a.login_fail_reason_id = b.id left join s_dictionary c on a.login_result_id = c.id left join staff d on a.staff_id = d.staff_id left join u_app e on a.sysresource_id = e.id where 1=1
auth_time > #auth_time#
auth_time < #auth_time_end#
a.ip like '%' || #ip# || '%'
a.login_fail_reason_id = #loginFailReason.id#
a.login_result_id = #loginResult.id#
d.staff_code like '%' || #staff.username# || '%'
e.name like '%' || #sysResource.name# || '%'
order by a.auth_time desc ) M
WHERE ROWNUM <= $lastrownum$
) WHERE RN_ > $firstrownum$

select count(1) from U_AUTH_LOG a left join s_dictionary b on a.login_fail_reason_id = b.id left join s_dictionary c on a.login_result_id = c.id left join staff d on a.staff_id = d.staff_id left join u_app e on a.sysresource_id = e.id where 1=1
auth_time > #auth_time#
auth_time < #auth_time_end#
a.ip like '%' || #ip# || '%'
a.login_fail_reason_id = #loginFailReason.id#
a.login_result_id = #loginResult.id#
d.staff_code like '%' || #staff.username# || '%'
e.name like '%' || #sysResource.name# || '%'
